en: Limepage serves as the company’s official website, showcasing its services and portfolio to enhance brand image and strengthen client trust. The site combines a modern design with user-friendly functionality, allowing visitors to quickly grasp the company’s expertise and past projects.

During development, I handled both frontend and backend implementation, partial layout and graphic design, as well as content organizating and writing, ensuring the website is both visually appealing and practical.
zh: 青頁（Limepage）是公司官方網站，用於展示公司的服務與作品集，旨在提升品牌形象並加強客戶信任。網站設計注重現代感與易用性，讓訪客能快速了解公司的專業領域和過往項目。
在開發過程中，我負責前後端實作、部分版面與圖像設計，內容整理及撰寫，確保整體網站既美觀又實用。
